author.persName: 'Ala al-Din Muhammad b. Abu Turab Gulistanah-i.

msItem.title: Minhaj al-Yaqin.
msItem.note: F1a: a) Impression of rectangular seal of ... Ibn Murtada 'Ali, dated A.H.1214. b) Partly effaced note with name Mahmud, not the author, presumably an owner. F1b: Impression of small oval seal of Muhammad Salim, date A.H. 1117, regnal year 51 (of Aurangzeb). Currently held in an envelope with a pencilled note by Simon Digby on it, dated June 1975. A commentary on the Testament of the Imam Ja'far al-Sadiq. Headings and punctuation in red.

bindingDesc.p: Condition: Lacks binding, though still mostly sewn together, considerable worm damage. End missing.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
